title: The Pirates of Penzance
creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Joseph Papp and Wilford Leach
brief_description: Frederic (Rex Smith) has been apprenticed to a pirate crew by mistake and when his term finishes he attempts to bring them to justice. Presenting a film adaptation of the classic Gilbert and Sullivan opera with music orchestrated, arranged and conducted by William Elliott, choreography by Graciela Daniele and cast including Kevin Kline (Pirate King), Angela lansbury (Ruth), Linda Ronstadt (Mabel) and George Rose (Major-General).
